name: Evergreen (CK Games)
description:
Evergreen is an endless strategy game where the objective is to plant and evolve trees to ensure their survival against various factors such as disease and natural catastrophes.

Credits

  • Developed by CK Games
  • Music by altrdom (https://soundcloud.com/altrdom)
  • Sound effects by Nicolo Scolieri (https://nicoloscolierisound.neocities.org/)
